授業目的: This class will study and examine American society from the view point of memories and their cultures.
到達目標: Students will obtain the ability to get multiple perspective to see US society.

トピック.授業計画1: Decide the course contents flexibly according to the interests and concerns of the students.

name: 【640】Minorities and American Society／Minorities and American Society
